key.title: Key
key.description: Key that defines how to uniquely idenitfy the add-on.

requires.title: Requires
requires.description:
Requires defines any additional addons that this one depends on to operate
correctly.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: Extensions defines the list of extensions that are associated with an add-on.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags is slice of tag sets that define what can be assigned to each document schema.

scenarios.title: Scenarios
scenarios.description:
Scenarios are applied to documents after normalization and before
validation to ensure that form specific extensions have been added
to the document.

identities.title: Identities
identities.description:
Identities that are specific for the add-on and may be validated against or
used during conversion processes.

inboxes.title: Inboxes
inboxes.description:
Inboxes is a list of keys that are used to identify where copies of
documents can be sent.

corrections.title: Corrections
corrections.description:
Corrections is used to provide a map of correction definitions that
are supported by the add-on.

AddonDef.description: AddonDef is an interface that defines the methods that a tax add-on must implement.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: Partial or complete schema URL for the document type supported by correction.

types.title: Types
types.description: The types of sub-documents supported by the regime

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: Extension keys that can be included

reason_required.title: Reason Required
reason_required.description: ReasonRequired when true implies that a reason must be provided

stamps.title: Stamps
stamps.description: Stamps that must be copied from the preceding document.

CorrectionDefinition.description: CorrectionDefinition contains details about what can be defined in .

CorrectionSet.description: CorrectionSet defines a set of correction definitions for a selection of schemas.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the scenario for further information.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Array of tags that have been applied to the document.

ext_key.title: Extension Key
ext_key.description: Extension key that must be present in the document.

ext_code.title: Extension Code
ext_code.description:
Extension code that along side the key must be present for a match
to happen. This cannot be used without an `cbc.Code`. The value will
be copied to the note code if needed.

note.title: Note
note.description: A note to be added to the document if the scenario is applied.

codes.title: Codes
codes.description:
Codes is used to define additional codes for regime specific
situations.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description:
Ext represents a set of tax extensions that should be applied to
the document in the appropriate "tax" context.

Scenario.description: Scenario is used to describe a tax scenario of a document based on the combination of document type and tag used.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: Partial or complete schema URL for the document type

list.title: List
list.description: List of scenarios for the schema

ScenarioSet.description: ScenarioSet is a collection of tax scenarios for a given schema that can be used to determine special codes or notes that need to be included in the final document.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: Schema that the tags are associated with.

list.title: List
list.description: List of tags for the schema

TagSet.description: TagSet defines a set of tags and their descriptions that can be used for a specific schema in the context of a Regime or Addon.
